issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Get and install KS from 1_8_X or 2_0_X branch
2. Go to Mashups > Facebook > login/logout
3. Make "Force dialog: false"
4. Press "Connect with Facebook"

Actual: Cannot connect to Facebook. See attachment for logcat log.
Expected: Should be able to login to Facebook when "Force dialog" is false

Note: Only tested on v8. Did not test on rhino.
fields.summary: Android: Facebook - If Titanium.Facebook.forceDialogAuth is false, cannot login to Facebook account
fields.environment:
SDK build: 1.8.2, 2.0.0.v20120329191102
Runtime: v8
Device: HTC Amaze 4G (2.3.4)

comments.body: Fixed in recent versions of Ti.Facebook
